add_to_watchlist.name: add_to_watchlist
add_to_watchlist.description: Add a list of stocks to the watchlist.

stocks.description: List of stock symbols to add to the watchlist.

symbols.description: List of stock symbols that were successfully added to the watchlist.

order_id.description: ID of the order to cancel.

status.description: New status of the order after cancellation attempt.

filter_stocks_by_price.name: filter_stocks_by_price
filter_stocks_by_price.description: Filter stocks based on a price range.

stocks.description: List of stock symbols to filter.

filtered_stocks.description: Filtered list of stock symbols within the price range.

fund_account.name: fund_account
fund_account.description: Fund the account with the specified amount.

amount.description: Amount to fund the account with.

binding_card.description: Card number associated with the account.

get_available_stocks.name: get_available_stocks
get_available_stocks.description: Get a list of stock symbols in the given sector.

sector.description: The sector to retrieve stocks from (e.g., 'Technology').

stock_list.description: List of stock symbols in the specified sector.

current_time.description: Current time in HH:MM AM/PM format.

get_order_details.name: get_order_details
get_order_details.description: Get the details of an order.

symbol.description: Symbol of the stock in the order.

price.description: Price at which the order was placed.

num_shares.description: Number of shares in the order.

get_stock_info.name: get_stock_info
get_stock_info.description: Get the details of a stock.

symbol.description: Symbol that uniquely identifies the stock.

get_symbol_by_name.name: get_symbol_by_name
get_symbol_by_name.description: Get the symbol of a stock by company name.

symbol.description: Symbol of the stock or "Stock not found" if not available.

get_transaction_history.name: get_transaction_history
get_transaction_history.description: Get the transaction history within a specified date range.

history.description: List of transactions within the specified date range.

watchlist.description: List of stock symbols in the watchlist.

make_transaction.name: make_transaction
make_transaction.description: Make a deposit or withdrawal based on specified amount.

new_balance.description: Updated account balance after the transaction.

notify_price_change.name: notify_price_change
notify_price_change.description: Notify if there is a significant price change in the stocks.

stocks.description: List of stock symbols to check.

threshold.description: Percentage change threshold to trigger a notification.

notification.description: Notification message about the price changes.

symbol.description: Symbol of the stock to trade.

price.description: Price at which to place the order.

order_id.description: ID of the newly placed order.

price.description: Price at which the order was placed.

amount.description: Number of shares in the order.

remove_stock_from_watchlist.name: remove_stock_from_watchlist
remove_stock_from_watchlist.description: Remove a stock from the watchlist.

symbol.description: Symbol of the stock to remove.

trading_logout.name: trading_logout
trading_logout.description: Handle user logout for trading system.

update_market_status.name: update_market_status
update_market_status.description: Update the market status based on the current time.

current_time_str.description: Current time in HH:MM AM/PM format.

update_stock_price.name: update_stock_price
update_stock_price.description: Update the price of a stock.

symbol.description: Symbol of the stock to update.
